articles.title: Physical modeling for pure data (PMPD) and real-time interaction with an audio synthesis

title: tCircle2D
description: The `tCircle2D` object determines if a 2D "mass" is within a specified circular region. It takes messages to define the circle's center and its minimum/maximum radii. The object outputs a boolean (0 or 1) indicating the mass's containment, along with its distance and speed relative to the circle's center.
